original_text: God chose who would be his people from the beginning. He has not turned against them now. Remember what the Bible tells us about Elijah. He wanted God to punish Israel's people. Elijah said:
korean_text: 하나님이 그 미리 아신 자기 백성을 버리지 아니하셨나니 너희가 성경이 엘리야를 가리켜 말한 것을 알지 못하느냐 그가 이스라엘을 하나님께 고발하되

sentences.original_text: God chose who would be his people
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 자신의 백성이 될 사람들을 선택하셨다

sentences.original_text: He has not turned against them now
Remember what the Bible tells us
He wanted God to punish Israel's people
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님이 이스라엘 백성을 벌하시기를 원했다
